name: The Mask
overview: Somebody Stop Me! With this Mask, you can do anything! Zip around at the speed of sound! Pull guns and mallets out of thin air! Spin like a tornado! And it's a good thing, cubby, because crime boss Dorian Tyrel is going to blow the CoCo Bongo club into next week unless you can get past all of Edge City's toughest thugs! Let's Rock This Joint!
